# <Feature Name> Implementation Log

> Repeatable file template — copy into `docs/implementation/` when kicking off a new build journal for a feature.

- **Driving Spec:** ../specs/<feature>.md
- **Design:** ../design/<feature>.md
- **Owner:** Person / Pair / Bot
- **Start Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
- **Status:** In Progress / Blocked / Ready for Review

## Task Checklist

- [ ] Task 1 – keep each item bite-sized (≤ 1 day of work)
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

> Update the checklist as you go—add, reorder, or mark complete. If scope changes, reflect it here.

## Daily Notes

### YYYY-MM-DD

- Summary of work (commands run, code areas touched)
- Tests executed (`cargo check`, specific unit/integration tests)
- Decisions or deviations from the spec (link to ADRs/TBD IDs)
- Blockers / follow-up actions for next session

### YYYY-MM-DD

- ...

## Integration & Verification

- Evidence of testing (screenshots/logs optional, but describe results)
- Outstanding verification steps (QA playtest, balancing review, etc.)

## Documentation Touchpoints

- List files updated (design/spec/feature/project docs)
- Add reminders if feature and roadmap updates are still pending.

## Handoff / Wrap-Up Notes

- Remaining polish or bugs to track elsewhere.
- Recommendations for future iterations.
